text: Ama koros Yallak kalah taniimiy, tu keenik kale waytaah addunyaa kee akeeral tu keenih xiqe wayta yaqbuden, tamahim kah naqbudem Yallih xaqul shafaaqatta neh takkem keh iyyaanama iyyan, Nabiyow keenik ixxic: isin Yalli qaranwaa kee baaxol usuk aaxigewaam kaah warissaanaa? Yalli ama koros agleh kaat hayya haytaamak saytunnooweeh fayya iyyek
